heading: Welcome
text: book collection lecture notes covering syllabus Biomathematics course (BSTA 2104) Btech Biotechnology Kerala Agricultural University

heading: Preface
text:

feedback, please feel free contact Dr.Pratheesh P. Gopinath. E-mail: pratheesh.pg@kau.Thank !

heading: UNIT 1
text: Rolle’s theorem; Lagrange’s theorem; Taylor’s Maclaurin’s series; Differentiation Partial differentiation, Euler’s theorem homogeneous function, change variable; Jacobian, maxima minima one variable, two two variables, eigen values eigen vectors matrix; Reduction formulae, definite integrals applications

heading: UNIT 2
text: Solution ordinary differential equation first degree first order application determination volume blood drug distribution; Epidemic models, Simultaneous differential equation first order applications predator models; Linear differential equations higher order applications simple biological problem; Numerical methods solving algebraic transcendental equations.
